summary: This bill, the Roberto Clemente Commemorative Coin Act, mandates the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue commemorative coins honoring the life and legacy of baseball legend Roberto Clemente. The coins will be available in gold, silver, and clad denominations. Proceeds from surcharges on coin sales will go to the Roberto Clemente Foundation for educational, youth sports, and disaster relief initiatives. The bill also details coin design specifications, legal tender status, and a 1-year issuance period.
